# AI Life Summary (AI Test Lab)

> AI-powered personality tests and life insights generator.

## About
AI Life Summary (AI Test Lab) is a free web application that provides AI-powered personality tests and life insights. Our main services include AI Life Summary (birthday-based personality insights) and AI Age Calculator (real age vs mental age vs energy age comparison).

## Features
- Free AI-generated life summaries based on birthday
- AI Age Calculator with mental and energy age analysis
- Instant results with no registration required
- Available in 5 languages (English, Korean, Japanese, Chinese, Spanish)
- Share results on social media
- Download results as images
- Mobile-friendly responsive design
- Blog with articles about self-discovery, coding for beginners, and lifestyle

## Main Pages
- /: Home page with test selection
- /life-summary/: AI Life Summary test
- /life-summary/result.html: Life summary results page
- /age-calculator/: AI Age Calculator test
- /age-calculator/result.html: Age calculator results page
- /blog.html: Blog with articles about personality, self-discovery, and coding
- /about.html: Information about the service
- /contact.html: Contact information

## How It Works
### AI Life Summary
1. User enters their birthday (month and day)
2. AI analyzes the date and generates a unique life summary
3. User can view, share, or download their personalized result

### AI Age Calculator
1. User enters their birth date
2. User answers 7 lifestyle questions
3. AI calculates real age, mental age, and energy age
4. User receives detailed comparison and insights

## Target Audience
- People interested in personality analysis
- Users curious about birthday-based insights
- Adults interested in mental and energy age comparison
- Social media users who enjoy sharing personality content
- 50+ adults learning web development (blog content)
